column5: Lots of latkas for you. And when you spin the dreidel-I ALWAYS take gimmel !

Oi Vey, I never knew, I worked for a Hebrew family for 8 years in their theatre in the 60s (right across crom the strip joint on Spadina lol) and my mother worked at a Hebrew home / hospital, Baycrest in North York for 20 years, great people. have food one Roy
